children.text: Consider converting functions to built in, to improve load times
Spawn a shop (AS) in each region...
Restart is too many sectors are repeated
Repeat the function if the name is taken otherwise add it

parameters.y: lerp(Self.Y,CanvasToLayerY("Cursor",LayerToCanvasX("map", MB_Icon.x, MB_Icon.y - MB_Icon.Height/2) ,LayerToCanvasY("map", MB_Icon.x, MB_Icon.y - MB_Icon.Height/2)),0.1)
